create_entry.description: Add a record to a specified list.

create_record.description: Creates a new record such as peron,company or deal.

find_list_entry.description: Search for entries in a specific list in Attio using filters and return matching results.

find_record.description: Search for records in Attio using filters and return matching results.

update_entry.description: Update the attributes of an existing entry in a list.

props.name: entryId
props.description: The unique identifier of the entry to update.

update_record.description: Update an existing record with new attribute values.

props.name: recordId
props.description: The unique identifier of the record to update.

list_entry_created.description: Triggers when a new entry is added.

list_entry_updated.description: Triggers when an existing entry is updated.

record_created.description: Triggers when a new record such as person,company or deal is created.

record_updated.description: Triggers when an existing record is updated (people, companies, deals, etc.).
